B.122-'09                          Sanitarium, California 
                                         October 11, 1909 

Elder J. A. Burden 

Dear Brother: 


     I am instructed to say that in our educational work, there is to be no compromise in order to meet the world's standard. God's commandment-keeping people are not to unite with the world, to carry various lines of work according to worldly plans and worldly wisdom.
